import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Button from '../../Button/Button'; import './Post.css'; import { Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Mapp from '../../Map/map'; class post extends Component { render() { return (

{this.props.title}

Posted by {this.props.author} on {this.props.date} || Shot at {this.props.location.text} on {this.props.taken_date}

) } } export default post;
